items.title: ITC lines up Rs 20,000 crore capex, aims to improve FMCG margins
items.summary: ITC plans to invest Rs 20,000 crore in its businesses over the medium term, focusing on improving margins in FMCG. The company has recently set up eight manufacturing plants targeting FMCG, sustainable packaging, and agricultural products.

items.title: meridianalgo-smarttrader added to PyPI
items.summary: meridianalgo-smarttrader has been added to PyPI, offering ultra-accurate AI stock analysis with universal GPU support including AMD, Intel, NVIDIA, and Apple.

items.title: meridianalgo-smarttrader 1.0.0
items.summary: meridianalgo-smarttrader 1.0.0 is a new AI stock analysis tool that boasts ultra-accuracy and universal GPU support. It is compatible with AMD, Intel, NVIDIA, and Apple GPUs.

items.title: Orbital datacenters subject to launch stress, nasty space weather, and expensive house calls
items.summary: Orbital datacenters face challenges such as launch stress, space weather, and expensive maintenance, highlighting the difficulties of operating fragile computer equipment in space. William Gibson's Neuromancer, which features an AI housed in an orbital datacenter, continues to inspire innovation and interest in the potential of advanced technology.

items.title: Intel plans to slash 25,000 jobs in 2025 as new CEO warns ‘there are no more blank checks’
items.summary: Intel plans to slash 25,000 jobs in 2025 as new CEO warns ‘there are no more blank checks’ - Intel’s CEO Lip-Bu Tan sent a memo to employees Thursday informing them of significant ongoing layoffs and other cost-cutting measures.

items.title: Shipping giant set to roll out world's first AI-controlled autonomous car carrying ships -and at 750 ft long and weighing almost 100,000 tons, it's probably the largest AI-driven vessel ever
items.summary: Shipping giant announces world's first AI-controlled autonomous car carrying ships, set to be the largest AI-driven vessel ever, amid ongoing concerns about long-term impact and reliability.

items.title: LeBron James Not Happy With AI Videos Showing Him Pregnant
items.summary: LeBron James' attorneys sent a cease and desist letter to developers of an AI image generator creating videos of NBA stars in bizarre situations, such as James appearing pregnant, citing ethical concerns.

William Gibson's Neuromancer, a cyberpunk novel featuring an AI housed in an orbital datacenter, remains relevant after 40 years.

items.title: 想读Fast Python
items.summary: The news discusses a book titled Fast Python, focusing on mastering Python techniques and libraries to decrease run times and effectively manage large datasets.

items.title: Claude Code Introduces Specialized Sub-Agents

items.title: Intel plans to slash 25,000 jobs in 2025 as new CEO warns ‘there are no more blank checks’
items.summary: Intel plans to cut 25,000 jobs by 2025, with new CEO emphasizing the need for cost-cutting measures in a memo to employees.

items.title: Tech Companies Are Blocking Microsoft’s Creepy ‘Recall’ Feature
items.summary: Tech companies are blocking Microsoft's 'Recall' feature, seen as creepy and intrusive.

items.title: Cisco ThousandEyes Helps Drive Performance with the McLaren Formula 1 Team
items.summary: Cisco ThousandEyes is helping to improve performance with the McLaren Formula 1 Team by showcasing real stories of organizations using Cisco solutions to drive impressive results.

items.title: ChatGPT can find and book an Airbnb for you now
items.summary: ChatGPT is now able to find and book an Airbnb for users, as demonstrated by the cofounder of Unlimited Industries using the AI tool for an event.

items.title: Opinion: Wall Street Is Challenging The Low-Cost-Investing Revolution
items.summary: Wall Street is challenging the low-cost-investing revolution that has benefited ordinary investors by offering free brokerage accounts and commission-free index funds.

items.summary: Microsoft is reportedly boosting AI investment by laying off thousands of employees in order to increase funding for AI projects.

items.title: Improvado: Unify 500+ Data Sources and Maximize Your ROAS with Automated Marketing Reporting
items.summary: Improvado aims to help marketing teams unify over 500 data sources and automate marketing reporting to maximize Return on Ad Spend (ROAS). This solution addresses the challenge of fragmented data, inconsistent reports, and delayed decision-making in marketing.

items.title: ANN/Oshkosh Sponsor, Gleim Aviation, Is Ready To Teach You A Thing Or Two...
items.summary: Gleim Aviation, industry leader in aviation training materials, will be offering education at the Oshkosh Sponsor booth. Founded in 1980 by Dr. Irvin N. Gleim, the company aims to provide training for aviation enthusiasts.

items.title: AWS and Idaho National Lab to collaborate on AI for nuclear energy
items.summary: AWS and Idaho National Lab are teaming up to utilize AI for nuclear energy, with the goal of researching and scaling modular nuclear reactors to power data centers.

items.title: This Week in AI: President Trump Releases AI Action Plan; Delta Tests Personalized Pricing
items.summary: The White House released a policy roadmap outlining President Trump's strategy to maintain U.S. leadership in AI, emphasizing deregulation, infrastructure development, export controls, and freedom.

items.title: Rewriting The Narrative Of Hurricane Katrina
items.summary: A new Nat Geo docuseries uses tech and survivor testimony to reframe Hurricane Katrina as a preventable digital-age failure, not just a natural disaster.

items.title: US Denies Visas To Venezuelan Little League Baseball Team
items.summary: Venezuelan little league baseball team denied visas for the Senior Baseball World Series in the US.

items.title: Nans Rivat drives access to mental health care through strategic investments at PACE Healthcare Capital
items.summary: Nans Rivat drives access to mental health care through strategic investments at PACE Healthcare Capital, making mental health care more accessible. PACE Healthcare Capital invests in transformative, capital-efficient digital health and tech-enabled companies.

items.title: Cyberpunk 2077 Apple Mac review: an impressive, thoughtful port from CD Projekt RED
items.summary: Cyberpunk 2077 has been successfully ported to Apple Mac computers, offering ray tracing support and advanced MetalFX features. CD Projekt Red's release of the game for Apple Silicon Mac shows the potential for AI technology to enhance gaming experiences on different platforms.

items.title: Mistral’s new “environmental audit” shows how much AI is hurting the planet
items.summary: Mistral's new 'environmental audit' highlights the environmental impact of AI, with billions of prompts contributing to the overall harm. This raises ethical concerns about the sustainability of AI technology.

items.title: nemo-toolkit 2.4.0
items.summary: The nemo-toolkit 2.4.0 has been released, providing NeMo, a toolkit for Conversational AI. This innovation in AI technology aims to advance research and development in the field of Conversational AI.

items.title: Shake off that boardom

items.title: Microsoft gives Copilot a face - here's how to try your new Appearance chat buddy
items.summary: Microsoft introduces Appearance feature for Copilot, allowing testers to have a more human-like chat experience with capabilities like smiling and nodding.

items.title: Invenergy says Grain Belt Express will go forward despite DOE decision
items.summary: Invenergy's Grain Belt Express project will continue despite the U.S. Department of Energy's decision stating that federal involvement is not critical in the first phase.

items.title: ai-bootstrap added to PyPI
items.summary: ai-bootstrap, a CLI tool for scaffolding AI projects with GitHub Codespace integration and AI-powered project planning, has been added to PyPI.

items.title: interro added to PyPI
items.summary: Interro, an AI-powered code understanding and querying tool, has been added to PyPI for developers to use in their projects.

items.title: A Windsurf AI engineer says Google gave him a job offer that would 'explode same day.' He didn't take it.
items.summary: A Windsurf AI engineer turned down a job offer from Google that was said to 'explode same day', sparking speculation on the increasing competition for AI talent in the startup world.

items.title: Palantir Stock Climb to Record High on Robust Sales and Major Army Contract
items.summary: Palantir stock reaches record high due to strong sales and securing a major army contract, fueled by key AI alliances.

items.title: Elon Musk is about to ruin Vine just like he’s ruined everything else
items.summary: Elon Musk mentioned the idea of bringing back Vine in 'AI form,' which has been met with skepticism and criticism.

items.title: Microsoft’s Copilot AI Assistant Gets Aging Digital Avatars
items.summary: Microsoft is giving its Copilot AI assistant a more human touch by introducing aging digital avatars through a feature called Copilot Appearance. The new feature was first rolled out on iPhone in Canada.

items.title: Nothing Phone 3 Review: A Quirky and Fun Phone for Photographers
items.summary: Nothing, a British brand founded in 2020, releases its first flagship phone, the Phone 3, targeted at photographers and aiming to compete with top industry players.

items.title: Apple Adds 13, 16 and 18 Plus Age Ratings to Its Apps and Games: What to Know
items.summary: Apple has added 13, 16, and 18 plus age ratings to its apps and games to improve child safety measures. This move demonstrates a focus on ethics in ensuring appropriate content is easily identifiable for users of different age groups.
